rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
解锁肿瘤免疫逃避：IL1RL1+ Treg 细胞和 CAF 合作应对免疫治疗耐药性研究人员证明，IL1RL1+ 调节性 T 细胞 (Treg) 和癌症相关成纤维细胞 (CAF) 之间的串扰可驱动组织修复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Unlocking-tumor-immune-evasion-IL1RL12b-Treg-cells-and-CAFs-collaborate-for-immunotherapy-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230830/Unlocking-tumor-immune-evasion-IL1RL12b-Treg-cells-and-CAFs-collaborate-for-immunotherapy-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa7b4135-55a0-4913-9b7e-2c79248579b6 Wed, 30 Aug 2023 03:54:00 -0400 Unlocking tumor immune evasion: IL1RL1+ Treg cells and CAFs collaborate for immunotherapy resistance
AI 聊天机器人提供了错误的癌症治疗建议研究人员评估了大语言模型 (LLM) 在提供癌症治疗建议方面的可靠性，发现聊天机器人的建议中有 33.33% 部分与既定指南不一致。该研究强调，随着人工智能技术渗透到医疗保健决策中，需要谨慎和监管。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/AI-chatbot-provides-in Correct-cancer-treatment-recommendations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/AI-chatbot-provides-in Correct-cancer-treatment-recommendations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fda3659-8494-402b-aee1-dc81ebf9d2a8 Tue, 29 Aug 2023 23:59:00 -0400 AI chatbot provides incorrect cancer treatment recommendations
零新冠政策终止后中国全因死亡率上升2022年12月中国放弃零新冠政策后，超额死亡人数大幅激增，两个月内死亡人数估计达187万人。这些数字明显超过了中国官方估计的 6 万人因 COVID-19 死亡的数字，表明民众免疫力有限的潜在影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/A-rise-in-all-cause-mortality-in-China-following-termination-of-the-Zero-COVID-Policy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/A-rise-in-all-cause-mortality-in-China-following-termination-of-the-Zero-COVID-Policy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9388cce6-0fa0-4576-a080-81f2103477b8 Tue, 29 Aug 2023 23:52:00 -0400 A rise in all-cause mortality in China following termination of the Zero COVID Policy
西尼罗河病毒发病率飙升至 2012 年以来最高研究人员讨论了美国对西尼罗河病毒和其他虫媒病毒的监测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/West-Nile-virus-surges-to-highest-incidence-since-2012.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/West-Nile-virus-surges-to-highest-incidence-since-2012.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2869c293-c981-4a91-b1eb-a73d4591e899 Tue, 29 Aug 2023 23:41:00 -0400 West Nile virus surges to highest incidence since 2012
易于实施的策略使心血管疾病的新诊断数量增加了一倍以上根据今天在 ESC 2023 年大会热线会议上公布的最新研究成果，与常规护理相比，对 2 型糖尿病或慢性阻塞性肺疾病 (COPD) 患者进行主动筛查后，新诊断的心血管疾病增加了一倍多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Easy-to-implement-strategy-more-than-doubles-new-diagnoses-of-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Easy-to-implement-strategy-more-than-doubles-new-diagnoses-of-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49ca13e9-c71f-4ff0-8756-01d9e0a576d8 Tue, 29 Aug 2023 23:15:11 -0400 Easy-to-implement strategy more than doubles new diagnoses of cardiovascular disease
肠道细菌的差异可能是花生过敏发生的早期指标西奈山伊坎医学院的研究人员领导的一项新研究揭示了婴儿肠道细菌及其代谢副产物的关键差异，这可能预测儿童中期花生过敏的发生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Differences-in-gut-bacteria-can-be-early-indicators-for-the-development-of-peanut-allergies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Differences-in-gut-bacteria-can-be-early-indicators-for-the-development-of-peanut-allergies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9d8d706-f770-4f11-972f-aab9aa2f0ca5 Tue, 29 Aug 2023 23:12:00 -0400 Differences in gut bacteria can be early indicators for the development of peanut allergies
保持稳定的体重可能有助于女性长寿加州大学圣地亚哥分校牵头的一项多机构研究显示，60 岁后保持体重的女性更有可能活到 90 岁、95 岁或 100 岁（被称为超常长寿）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Maintaining-stable-weight-may-help-women-live-longer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Maintaining-stable-weight-may-help-women-live-longer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=436cc3d1-9fdd-4b27-ba96-9c8af71a70e3 Tue, 29 Aug 2023 23:10:03 -0400 Maintaining stable weight may help women live longer
漂浮疗法可能是治疗神经性厌食症的一种新方法俄克拉荷马州塔尔萨市劳瑞德大脑研究所 (LIBR) 的研究人员进行的一项开创性研究，在治疗神经性厌食症 (AN) 方面取得了重大进展，神经性厌食症是一种以体重过轻、身体形象异常为特征的饮食失调症和焦虑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Floatation-therapy-may-be-a-novel-treatment-for-anorexia-nervosa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Floatation-therapy-may-be-a-novel-treatment-for-anorexia-nervosa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf9ae27c-3603-4100-a34b-689dc700db4b Tue, 29 Aug 2023 23:03:24 -0400 Floatation therapy may be a novel treatment for anorexia nervosa
关键抗生素的更高剂量和更短的治疗时间被证明对结核病患者是安全的根据伦敦大学圣乔治研究人员领导的一项临床试验以及《NEJM Evidence》上发表的结果，事实证明，较高剂量和较短治疗时间的基础结核病 (TB) 药物对患者是安全的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Higher-dose-and-shorter-treatment-of-key-antibiotic-proven-to-be-safe-for-TB-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Higher-dose-and-shorter-treatment-of-key-antibiotic-proven-to-be-safe-for-TB-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53613fbc-77ed-4751-8561-39315eb986f3 Tue, 29 Aug 2023 22:38:35 -0400 Higher dose and shorter treatment of key antibiotic proven to be safe for TB patients
光驱动细菌可用于瞄准并杀死癌细胞高精度靶向恶性肿瘤对于生物医学研究人员来说是一个挑战。然而，在不久的将来，这种情况可能会发生范式转变，通过使用特殊工程细菌，可以有效地消除恶性细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Light-driven-bacteria-could-be-used-to-target-and-kill-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Light-driven-bacteria-could-be-used-to-target-and-kill-cancer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3534ff2-8bcb-47f8-b663-29ef0925d46e Tue, 29 Aug 2023 21:35:15 -0400 Light-driven bacteria could be used to target and kill cancer cells
